import'./Navbar.css';import UserIcon from'./imgs/user.svg';import{PROJECT_SRC}from'./Const.js';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const userIcon=`${PROJECT_SRC}imgs/user.svg`;console.log(userIcon);function setUserSectionWidth(){let user_section=document.getElementById('user-section');let title=document.getElementById('title');let titleRect=title.getBoundingClientRect();let width=titleRect.width;// user_section.setAttribute('width', width)
user_section.style.width=`${width}px`;}export const Navbar=()=>{const[loggedin,setLoggedin]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setUserSectionWidth();window.addEventListener('resize',setUserSectionWidth);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('resize',setUserSectionWidth);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"title",children:"Sudoku"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button",children:"Rankings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button",children:"Quick Game"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"user-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"user-icon",src:UserIcon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"user-text",children:loggedin?'account':'login'})]})]});};// export { Navbar }
